Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored 15 points in the first quarter, only 8 points shy of the Lakers' total points
Others: Donovan Mitchell scored 24 points, made 10 of 20 shots from the field and 4 of 10 shots from the 3-point line, and registered 3 rebounds, 7 assists and 3 steals in the game. The Cavaliers won with a 134-110 score.
